Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard made his NBA season debut against the Atlanta Hawks, tallying 12 points in 19 minutes.
The Clippers snapped a two-game losing streak in Leonard’s return, improving to 20-15 on the season.
Post-Match Reflections: Kawhi Leonard expressed his excitement about returning, stating 'It felt great. Was able to throw some paint on the canvas tonight. We're working to create something beautiful so let's keep going.'
Leonard also praised his teammates, mentioning their strong performance in his absence and highlighting players like James, Zu, and Norm.
